# harness_platform_policy (Resource)

Resource for creating a Harness Policy.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "harness_platform_policy" "test" {
  identifier = harness_platform_policy.test.identifier
  name       = harness_platform_policy.test.name
  rego       = "package test"
}
```
